p:
To project population changes over the next 50 years for the Barents Sea and the Bay of Biscay we applied output from the MPI-ESM-LR of the Max-Planck-Institute for Meteorology (MPI-M) in Hamburg ( http://cera-www.dkrz.de/WDCC/ui/)
49 . This is one of the Earth system models (ESMs) used within the IPCCâ€™s Fifth Assessment (AR5) Coupled Model Inter-comparison Project 5 [CMIP5].
